amendment.description: Amendment ensures that a representative from a minority-serving institution is a member of the Solar Technology Roadmap Committee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-304 to ensure that a representative from a minority-serving institution is a member of the Solar Technology Roadmap Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
